column5: Feeling a little stir crazy my brother and I decided to head up to the cottage to ice fish. Unfortunately or fortunately we timed it so we were there with all the crazy snow a few weeks ago Our main plan wasn't accomplished but we got out, caught some fish and had an awesome time even being stuck for an extra day. https://www.northernjacks.com/post/ice-fishing-in-snowmageddon Thanks Andrew
When I saw the word snowmageddon I thought you went to work for the weather channel.
Lol. Well that for sure where I heard it from I must have had 5 alerts go off on my phone leading up. Was a lot of snow but not anything abnormal either
I lived through that mess....it was quite the sight seeing a bunch of southerners trying to shovel snow with pitchforks. PjShorthorn
Our snowmageddon weather heads here were going nuts on Tuesday predicting 12 inches of snow, we may of got 1, i have not heard an apology yet.
Well,jim cantori from the weather channel probably be knocking on your door soon,to say he really messed up.
